default.2WaysLS: Heavily discounted rates on shipping labels thanks to our volume accounts with world class carriers and partners
default.2WaysLSTwo: Your own local US and Canadian address for fast low cost cross-border transfers
default.Account-param: Join us for great benefits by getting your Free Account right now! Enjoy exclusive access to our specialized services, unique features and unmatched prices
default.CrossBorder-params:
With our Cross-Border Mailbox service you receive your
packages and documents within their originating country in the
most convenient, fast and economical way. With your ShipLink
address you can make purchases online at your favorite stores,
subscribe to magazines, receive correspondence and much more
without the extra costs of international shipping and surcharges applied by retailers. You can pickup in person or use our seamless forwarding service. There are no brokerage fee or taxes from Canada to USA for items worth less than $800 USD.
default.Header: Shop and Ship in USA and Canada
default.ls1: Register for free and get your new shipping address to receive your purchases online.
default.ls2: Shop at your favorite online store and use your new local shipping address
default.ls3: Pick up your purchases at your selected ShipLink Mailbox location or Receive them at your door via our cross-border forwarding services
default.SignupP:
Join us for great benefits by getting your account right now!
Enjoy exclusive access to our specialized services, unique features and unmatched prices
default.why1-params: State of the art website and platform. you can buy, track and control in real time, all in one place.
default.why2-params: Make your payments online for fast collection at branches and terminals.
default.why3-params: For our Cross-Border services, You only pay for what it weighs, you do not pay for volumetric weight.
default.why4-params:
You accumulate points that you can redeem for discounts on our services.
(Comming Soon)
default.why5-params: Several terminals and branches in the US and Canada for in person pickup and dropoff
default.why6-params: The heavier your package, the cheaper your rate per pound.
default.works3: Print Label, Stick it On, and Ship
default.PaP: Contact Us for Custom Plans and Pricing
default.OWC: Our World Class Partners and Carriers
default.WoW: We work with the worldâ€™s most reputable carriers
default.HIW1: Quickly enter Origin and Destination addresses, get instant prices, times and carrier options.
default.HIW2: Select the Shipping option your prefer : Carrier, Price and Speed of your choice.
default.HIW3: Click Print, stick the label on your package and Ship.
default.HIW4: Conveniently track your shipment directly from your Dashboard
default.HIW_SubTittle: With our high volume carrier discounts and partnerships, we can offer you exceptional shipping rates along with a state of the art Dashboard and operating experience.

about.Header_Title: We are the best-in-class platform for national and international shipping services. Our many years of experience, customer satisfaction.
about.Mission_param: We make your shipping experience easier for both personal and business through our services and distribution network, offering convenient and economical solutions through our best-in-class service.
about.Other1: World class business model using industry best practices
about.Other3: Established business with over 10 years of experience
about.Other4: Terminals and Service across all North America
about.Service_list1: National and international shipment labels (USPS, CP, DHL, UPS, etc)
about.Service_list2: Sale of shipping and packaging supplies
about.Service_list3: Cross-Border Mailboxes (Import, Export, Internet Purchases, Courier)
about.Service_Param: We are a comprehensive personal and business solutions service provider, helping you optimize and save on your shipping needs through the following services:
about.Vision_param: Our team offers customers consistent first-class service, an organization that is close to its customers and builds long term relationships.

ship.Ship1_param: Get an accurate and instant shipping quote by simply entering your package details such as weight, dimensions, and destination. Our system will provide you with a range of shipping options tailored to your needs.
ship.Ship2_param: Choose the service and carrier that best fits your shipping requirements from our list of trusted partners. We offer a variety of services to ensure your package reaches its destination on time and in perfect condition.
ship.Ship3: Print Label, Stick it On, and Ship
ship.Ship3_param: After selecting your service and carrier, print your shipping label directly from our platform. Securely attach the label to your package, ensuring all information is clearly visible
ship.Ship4_param: Stay updated with real-time tracking information. Our platform allows you to monitor the status of your shipment from dispatch to delivery.

mailbox.item1_string: Register for free and get your new shipping address to receive your purchases online.
mailbox.item2_string: Shop at your favorite online store and use your new local shipping address
mailbox.item3_string: Pick up your purchases at your ShipLink Mailbox branch or Receive them at your door via our cross-border transfer service
mailbox.Start_buy: Start Buy and Receive with us !
mailbox.sub_string: With our Cross-Border Mailbox service you receive your packages and documents within their originating country in the most convenient, fast and economical way. With your ShipLink address you can make purchases online at your favorite stores, subscribe to magazines, receive correspondence and much more without the extra costs of international shipping and brokerage surcharges for items worth less than $800 USD
mailbox.tilte_string: Discover the ultimate convenience with our Cross-Border Mailbox service. Receive packages and documents directly within their country of origin, saving you time and money. Your ShipLink address opens up a world of possibilities: shop online at your favorite stores, subscribe to magazines, receive important mail, and more. Enjoy all these benefits without worrying about hefty international shipping fees or brokerage surcharges on items under $800 USD.
mailbox.Title: Cross-Border Mailbox
